member.name: T:BookPubDB.DTOs.ArtistDto
member.summary: Represents a data transfer object (DTO) for an artist. This DTO is used to transfer artist-related data between different layers of the application while ensuring encapsulation and separation of concerns.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.DTOs.ArtistDto.FirstName
member.summary: Gets or sets the first name of the artist.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.DTOs.ArtistDto.LastName
member.summary: Gets or sets the last name of the artist.
